DOC.brief_title: RCT Jewish Family & Children 's Services ( JFCS ) HFHC Program
DOC.detailed_description: The goal Healthy Families/Healthy Children ( HFHC ) program ensure child The Region live stable , happy , healthy family situation . HFHC able deliver exist service proven effective new service research-based . Need address : Unhealthy relationship , inadequate parental skill attitude related nurture responsible parenting , lack knowledge finance and/or economic self sufficiency , underdeveloped employment readiness skill , difficult-to-access job opportunity housing . Proposed Services : In conjunction wide-range community partner operate comprehensive system care , JFCS provide public advertising campaign , Marriage Relationship Education/Skills ( MRES ) , Nurturing Parenting education , financial management education service , job career advancement service . HFHC design around strong marriage relationship education/skills ( MRES ) component . The program include parent skill class , robust effort address participation barrier , partnership local employment employment skill-building agency address economic stability need participant . Case management support service coordination ensure comprehensive service delivery every participant . Participants meaningful improvement marriage/relationship skill , improve parenting/co-parenting skill , improve family functioning , improve adult child well-being , increased economic stability/reduced poverty . Population group serve : Low-income individual , couple , engage couple , marry couple 18 year age 64 year age family members.Research component : The project conduct randomize control trial test hypotheses regard program 's effectiveness . The Control group wait list receive Intervention ( i.e. , program service ) final post-test measure complete .
